param.name: LVlistlimit
param.label: The number of last views displayed
param.description: How many views should be displayed?

param.name: LVexclusionlistTXT
param.label: You may enter a comma seperated list of user IDs that will be excluded from display.
param.description: Use this to hide admins, mods or certain individuals if you like.

param.name: LVguestsTXT
param.label: Language
param.description: Language for -guests have visited this profile-

param.name: LVadmingroupTXT
param.label: Admin Group
param.description: The admin or moderator group to whom the total visits count is shown. 18 for authors and up (same as special setting and default), 19 for editors and up, 20 for publishers and up, etc..

param.name: LVhideadminOPTION
param.label: Enable Total Visits Display To Specified Admin Group?
param.description: Enable showing total to the previously set usergroup and higher?

param.name: LVhidetotalOPTION
param.label: Enable Total Visits Display To Profile Owners?
param.description: Total can be shown to specified admin/moderator group, even when disabled for profile owners.

param.name: LVshowtotalOPTION
param.label: Also show totals to other logged in users?
param.description: For this setting to work, the total display setting above has to be enabled.

param.name: LVhideguestsOPTION
param.label: Show Guestcount?
param.description: Show the number of guests that have visited this profile? (Hide when you don\'t allow guests to view profiles)

param.name: LVusernameOPTION
param.label: Do you want to display the username or the name of the user.
param.description: Choose what to display. Username or Name.

param.name: LVdateformatOPTION
param.label: How would you like the date displayed?
param.description: Choose in what order to display the date.
